mods.name: Apex_CureAll_Tonic
mods.author: Apex
mods.description: A craftable cure-all tonic, with a pill variant. Currently, however, it only cures the 4 major afflictions that the tonics cure: Bacterial, Infections, Parasitic, and Concussions.

mods.name: Noxious_Crust_Icon_Fix
mods.author: Apex
mods.description: A fix for the all the types of Noxious Crust looking the same. Also, antipoison stops damage from Carrying Miasmic Items debuff

mods.name: Super_Stick
mods.author: Apex
mods.description: A very powerful, craftable stick. Perfect to use while AFK. Now with a craftable module variant.
